TextView.android:text: Which language is commonly used in her family?
Ghar ma kon c zeban ma zayda baat cheet k jati h

RadioButton.android:text: Other (Specify)(Koi aur zuban us ka naam likhain

TextView.android:text: To which religion does her family belong?
App ka mazhab kya ha

RadioButton.android:text: Other (Specify)(Koi aur mazhab us ka naam likhain)

TextView.android:text: How many people live in household?
App k ghar ma kitnay afraad rehtay han
How many rooms are in the household for sleeping?
Ghar ma kitnay kamray han jo sonay k liya istimaal hotay han
Does your household have a separate room/space for cooking?
Ghar ma khana pakanay k liya kya koi makhsoos kamra ya jaga ha?
What is the main kind of energy is used for cooking in this house?
Ghar ma khana pakanay k liya kis cheez ka istimaal hota ha

RadioButton.android:text: Other (Specify) (Koi aur cheez us ka naam likhain)

TextView.android:text: What material is used for the floor of the house?
Ghar ka farash banay k liya kis cheez ka istimaal kiya gaya ha

RadioButton.android:text: Other (specify)(Koi aur cheez us ka naam likhain)

TextView.android:text: What material is used for the wall of the house?
Ghar k deewarain banay k liya kis cheez ka istimaal kiya gaya ha

RadioButton.android:text: Other (specify)(Koi aur cheez us ka naam likhain)

TextView.android:text: What is the basic source of drinking water for the household members?
Ghar ma kis zaqai sa peenay ka pani istimal kiya jata ha

RadioButton.android:text: Community tap water (mohalay ma sa naal ka pani)
Other (Specify) (Koi aur cheez us ka naam likhain)

TextView.android:text: Does the woman treat water to make it suitable for drinking?
Kya peenay sa pehlay pani ko peenay ka qabil banaya jata ha

RadioButton.android:text: Yes, but occasionally (G han, laikin kabhi kabhi)

TextView.android:text: What technique does the woman use to make water suitable for drinking?
Is ma sa kon sa tareeqa istimaal kiya jata jis sa pani peenay k qabil ho jay

RadioButton.android:text: Use of chlorine or bleach (Cholrine ya bleach dala jata ja)
Strain through a cloth (Kapray sa chaan k)
Pass the water through soil, sand etc. (Pani ka gara ya matti ma sa guzara jata ha)
Solar disinfection (soraj k shuwaoun k zareeya jaraseem maray jatay han)
Pour in a utensil and let it stand in an open air (kisi baray bartan ma daal k rakh daitay han khuli hawa ma)
Filter is available in the house (ghar ma pani saaf karnay wala filter ha)
Buy filtered water from the market (bazar sa filter howa pani use hota ha)

TextView.android:text: What is the source of water for cooking and hand washing etc?
Kis cheez sa pani lay kar khana pakanay/peenay and dhonay k liya istimaal hota ha?

RadioButton.android:text: Community tap water (mohalay ma sa naal ka pani)
Other (Specify) (Koi aur cheez us ka naam likhain)

TextView.android:text: Age of the woman in years
Aurat k umer saloun ma
Did she attend school or madrassa, for education?
Auart taleem k liya kahan gay school ya madrasa?

RadioButton.android:text: Yes, only madrassa (G han, madrasay sa)
Yes, both (G han, doun jaga sa)

TextView.android:text: What level of education did the woman receive? Primary,secondary, College or more?
Aurat na taleem kahan tak hasil k

RadioButton.android:text: University (college k baad university bh gay)

TextView.android:text: Total years of education completed?
Kitnay saal k taleem hasil k

RadioButton.android:text: reluctant to respond (Jawab nahi daina chahti)
